card.name: Seven Stings Keep
card.property: Interrupt: When you declare a conflict, choose a number greater than 0 and bow this stronghold – your opponent declares defenders for this conflict. Then declare the conflict (choosing attackers, ring, conflict type, and province). You must declare a number of attackers equal to the number you chose.

card.name: Shinsei's Last Hope
card.property: Eminent. (This province starts the game faceup and cannot be turned facedown. It cannot be a stronghold province.) Each character played from this province costs 2 less to play and enters play dishonored.

card.name: Spectral Visitation
card.property: Reaction: After this province is revealed, discard the top 4 cards of your dynasty deck. Choose a character in your dynasty discard pile - put that character into play. If it is in play at the end of the phase, put it on the bottom of your dynasty deck.

card.name: Retire to the Brotherhood
card.property: Reaction: After this province is revealed - each player discards each character they control with no fate, reaveals cards from the top of their dynasty deck until an equal number of characters are revealed, and puts those characters into play. Shuffle.

card.name: Wind's Path
card.property: Eminent. During conflicts, you may play each character in this province as if it were in your hand. Each character played this way must enter play in the conflict.

card.name: Driven By Courage
card.property: Action: During a conflict at an [Air] province, choose a participating character - that character gets +2[Military] and +2[Political] until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Butcher of the Fallen
card.property: Rally. (After this card is revealed in a province, add the top card of your dynasty deck to the province, faceup.) While this character is attacking, characters with printed [Military] skill X or lower cannot be declared as defenders, where X is the number of unbroken provinces you control.

card.name: Cunning Negotiator
card.property: Rally. Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Political] duel against a character your opponent controls of their choice - resolve the duel. The controller of the duel's winner may trigger the attacked province's action ability as if they controlled the province, even if it has already been triggered this round (or specified period).

card.name: Daidoji Marketplace
card.property: Rally. (After this card is revealed in a province, add the top card of your dynasty deck to the province, faceup.)Reaction: After the conflict phase begins - reveal this holding's province.

card.name: Traveling Philosopher
card.property: Interrupt: When this character leaves play, choose an unbroken province you control – turn that province facedown.

card.name: Chronicler of Conquests
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, if there is a Battlefield in play - gain 1 honor.

card.name: Inspired Visionary
card.property: Reaction: After the fate phase begins, bow this character and choose an attachment – shuffle that attachment into its owner's conflict deck. That player draws 1 card.

card.name: Thunder Guard Elite
card.property: Pride. Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, lose 1 honor - your opponent discards 1 random card from their hand.

card.name: Dispatch to Nowhere
card.property: Action: Choose a character with no fate - discard that character.

card.name: Twilight Rider
card.property: Rally. (After this card is revealed in a province, add the top card of your dynasty deck to the province, faceup.)Reaction: After this character moves to a conflict, choose a character – ready that character.

card.name: Moto Stables
card.property: Reaction: After a character you control moves to a conflict - it gets +2[Military] until the end of the conflict. (Limit twice per round.)

card.name: Disciple of Shinsei
card.property: Interrupt: When this character leaves play, choose an attachment – discard it.

card.name: Obsidian Talisman
card.property: Void role only. Action: Lose 1 honor - discard a status token from attached character. (Unlimited.)

card.name: Highlight the Flaws
card.property: Fire role only. Interrupt: When the effects of a province's triggered ability would initiate – cancel those effects.

card.name: Mountaintop Vigil
card.property: Void role only. Action: During a conflict - cancel all ring effects until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Logistics
card.property: Action: Choose a card in or attached to a province - move that card to another unbroken non-stronghold province controlled by the same player. If there is a Battlefield in play, draw 1 card.

card.name: Ethereal Alignment
card.property: Interrupt: When the conflict phase ends, choose a broken province that shares an element with a ring in your claimed ring pool - restore that province. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Suffer the Consequences
card.property: Earth role only. Action: During the conflict phase, sacrifice a bowed (friendly)Bushi, Courtier, or Shugenja character - you may declare an additional [Political] conflict this phase. (Max 1 per phase.)

card.name: Never Yield
card.property: Reaction: After you declare an attack - until the end of the conflict, each character you control cannot be bowed or moved home by opponents' card effects.
